presentation.0: Born in Buenos Aires, Argentina, I'm a web developer passionate about design and front end development.
presentation.1: For 2 years, I've been involved in the maintenance and development of web applications and I'm always open to continue learning new concepts and languages related to the IT field.
presentation.2: Currently I aspire to be professionally involved in a long term project, in order to continue my creative process of creating web applications with attractive and unique user interfaces.

0.title: Front End React Developer

1.title: .NET Full Stack Developer
1.job_description: As a Freelancer, I have developed and maintained code for a web application aimed at managing the data of the students and teachers of a private institute for remote secondary education. I collaborated closely with other developers to meet the client's requirements, and we held meetings with the client, gathering their needs in detail in order to deliver an optimal and efficient product.

2.title: .NET Full Stack Developer
2.job_description: In my first work experience as a Freelancer, I participated in various projects, mainly using ASP.NET 5.0.
